text:
@realDonaldTrump Dumbest thing never heard.

"Getting him to lie." Pathetic.

What crooks, criminals and liars would say.

Wait, that is trump in a nutshell.

He who blames everybody else for his HUGE failures and screw ups. So many of them but coronavirus showcases them excuses.

Flynn lied. EOS
